website_summaries.verdict: 1More's Triple Driver Over-Ear headphones deliver audio that will appeal to those seeking an accurate mix, but there are many compelling alternatives available for the same price.
pros: Accurate audio performance with rich bass and exceptionally crisp highs
cons: Not for those seeking big bass

customer_reviews.title: Very Articulate sound/ sound quality
customer_reviews.text: First off these have a very very nice articulate sound or sound quality and sounds lush. Bass is more sensible and it matters alot on how much the recording calls for the bass on these headphones, i feel the bass on these do not lack but because it has been professionally adjusted it well when the track calls for the bass as it should be. Also it matters alot on your source it could make a night or day difference with these i think but take that with a pinch of salt. That is about it with my impression of this headphone. Dan.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive headphones from 1MORE
customer_reviews.text: I've been very impressed with these headphones. The sound quality is excellent with good detail. The build quality is very good and they look fantastic. They are not really over ear as they are not quite big enough, but they are very comfortable to wear. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Maurice Alderton

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, earshell pain, sound stage poor except the bass.
customer_reviews.text: Quality build, but sound stage is not that perfect for the price. I can't hear audioseparation quite clearly like I can on my Status Audio CB1 for more then triple less in price. Comfortwise, they are very uncomfortable and you will have an ear shell pain after wearing them for an hour. A bit disapointed in these to be honest. Better option is purchase Senheiser 599 if you want a better sound stage and much more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Damir

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like an expensive headphone
customer_reviews.text: Stuart bramleyball excellent quality sound and very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: stuart ball

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made headphones, great sound really well packed. These perform better than some of the bigger more expensive brands. Sound really good using a Dac.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: I use them with a USB DAC at my PC. They sound brilliant. Clear highs, wide soundstage and detailed punchy bass. The comfort of the pads seems to be an issue with a few people, but definitely worth a listen.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. W. Fotheringham

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought it had Bluetooth connectivity because of the price boy was I wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right
customer_reviews.text: While the headphones are nice in looks and feel, the sound leaves something to be desired. I've had many headphones before: grado, Oppo, audio technica and others. So I'm familiar with different sound profiles. These have mids and highs that are flat and crisp, similar to the PM-3 but slightly brighter. In that frequency range i actually prefer these to the PM-3s. The issue i have is with the bass. It is big but loose. The bass is there but it lacks definition. If you go for that kind of sound, then these would make for headphones that are fun to listen to. For me it was a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY MASTER CRAFTED HEADPHONES! ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM. LIKE A WORK OF ART LOOK LIKE $1000.00!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE HEADPHONES! STRAIGHT UP GORGEOUS BUILD AND SOUND QUALITY. TALK ABOUT CONSISTENT HI RES SOUND THAT REALLY MIRROR IMAGES WHAT YOUR LISTENING TO. I'VE ONLY LISTENED TO THESE THROUGH MY HIGH END 8 YEAR OLD TOSHIBA LAPTOP AND THEY SOUND SUPERB. SUPER DUPER VALUE AND THE TYPE OF HEADPHONES YOU DON'T GET BORED WITH YOU GET MORE ENAMORED WITH. LOVE THE BUILD QUALITY, HI RES SOUND AND BEAUTIFUL CABLES AND BOX. I AM PSYCHED WITH THIS SUPER WORTH IT PURCHASE. THANKS 1MORE TRIPLE DRIVER HEADPHONE COMPANY AND THANKS TO AMAZON PRIME FOR LISTING THESE INCREDIBLE VALUE HIGH END HEADPHONES. I AM STOKED!
customer_reviews.author: MARK P.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Sound Signature, and pretty premium build. Poor QoL
customer_reviews.text: Fun sound signature with good bass presence and highs. However, it hurts after a couple hours of use. Not really an over-ear headphone unless you have really small ears, so be aware if you don't like on ear headphones (most people don't). Sound isolation is also pretty bad. I'd been eyeing it for a while, and pulled the trigger because of a really big amazon sale, but there are too many comfort issues that keep me from recommending it for most use cases
customer_reviews.author: Sigma

customer_reviews.title: These have set a new standard for me
customer_reviews.text: I got my pair of 1More head phones back in May and oh how I am so Happy I did. The ear cushion is real leather and have more of hybrid of On ear / Over ear fit. they are very comfortable but if you have a big head you will not like them as they are almost to tight. The Sound is AMAZING. they seal out sounds so well I can not hear people talking to me when they are right next to me. I would not hesitate to put the money out again for another pair. Get them and you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: cal429258

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, nice looking and durable material
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mainly for music and gaming, I was so excited to get a durable headphone that provides premium sound quality at a very reasonable price. It fits my needs perfectly and works well. Very nice looking and cool design. I've been using it every day since I bought it and really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chang

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description.
customer_reviews.text: These are not over ear headphones. They are the same size as my on ear headphones. I have the triple driver and quad driver ear buds. This was a big disappointment. The description of size was misleading. I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: LWJR

customer_reviews.title: Never knew i could get this audio at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Ive always been into home theater audio, Loudspeakers, etc. Ive spent about 2k on my home theater set up and these headphones have blown me away.. very well balanced, clear highs, respectable lows for headphones. Id recommend these to anyone. Take note that im not very experienced in headphones though. Just quite impressed by these.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: The design of this over-ear headphone is cool. I heard that a famous superstar, Jay, designs the appearance. It is good-looking. The case of the headphone is nice and protects the item well. I bought this headphones originally because I trust the superstar, who has great reputation and thinks highly of quality. This headphone is really of good quality. The sound of the headphone is amazing. My roommate is a music student. She borrowed the headphone and used it to listen to symphony. She said that the headphone presents the melody and harmony of symphony in great details. So, if you want a headphone, which can show good quality of music, this headphone is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Yiran Zhang

customer_reviews.title: ... YouTube & let me tell you these puppies are terrific. They put some of my other in some ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these after a review I watched on YouTube & let me tell you these puppies are terrific.They put some of my other in some cases twice as much headphones to shame. They have actual sub bass great mids & some highs. They remind me of my Grado 325e’s ( minus sub bass) in that they make you want to tap your feet. They are easy to run, currently connected to my Fiio X3 2nd generation mp3 which I also recommend.Just buy these I seriously doubt you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great home theater headset
customer_reviews.text: I have used 1MORE Triple Driver for about two weeks now. I bought it for the holiday season after reading many reviews. The product I received certainly didn't disappoint. It came in with a nice case to protect it and the cable looks pretty durable, which is reassuring considering what happened to my last headset. The material used is premium quality. The sound profile is well balanced right out of the box. I enjoyed every minute wearing it either for watching movies, listening to musics or playing video games.
customer_reviews.author: Peng Hao

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning value
customer_reviews.text: Best sound quality I've ever heard inmy life, and beautifully constructed too. Very comfortable, I've worn them for hours while working with I issues. Just buy them, you will never regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Only thing missing is bluetooth capability
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of headphones and the sound quality is amazing. The headphones are comfortable and they look good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Headphones sound great! The plug has a short in it
customer_reviews.text: Wouldnt hou know it. My return window closed 3 days ago. Headphones sound great! The plug has a short in it.. probably used a dozen times :( I do want to own these. I can and will fix them myself. ALSO the cord was suspose to have a mic and controls in middle of wire and mine has neither
customer_reviews.author: Usual Smart A

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear sound. Buy them now!
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear mids and highs not overshadowed by the rich bass. Did side by side test with my Sony MDR 100abn. These are clearly the next level above those. I'm afraid I'm going to have to spend around $500 to beat the sound of these. Just listened to the first minute of "wish you were here" by Pink Floyd. It sounded completely different than the other 499 times I've heard it. These headphones are amazing 👌
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stewart

customer_reviews.title: on ear phones..
customer_reviews.text: BASS is what I love about this headphones it is a skull shaker. I like using it for watching movies mostly. Made for Maserati gran cabrio when you buy a car,so special.
customer_reviews.author: dexspeed

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: could be more comfortable, pretty tight, but sound quality is amazing. can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: Iden Mozafari

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound and design
customer_reviews.text: I used it for about a six months and it was a good product 1- sound quality is great 2- the design and the quality of materials are excellent 3- it's not a good comfort because it's on ear not over ear. For me if i use it for more than 1 hours i feel annoying. I'll say it's 70 % comfort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paired w/ HiBy R6 and NewFantasia Balanced Headphone Cable
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with the HiBy R6 High-Resolution Digital Audio Player and "NewFantasia HIFI cable with 2.5mm Trrs Balanced" headphone cable (  ) The sound is awesome, with very clear highs and deep lows. The use of the balanced cable makes a large difference in cleaning up the sound and extending the range. Using the stock single-ended cable made the headphones perform about average for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones/ brand
customer_reviews.text: I am BLOWN AWAY with the awesome quality sound of this headphones! I have been thru many different brands trying to find something that will sound like this pair of 1More headphones and if your picky like me and so many others you should definitely buy them, they’re worth every penny. These are absolutely and without a doubt the very best brand of headphones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel CR

customer_reviews.title: Great head phones
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift and the person receiving them loves them. They really like the sound dampening in the noisy office area.
customer_reviews.author: Tazman

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Built very well. Great looking. Sound very good for their price.
customer_reviews.author: Derik McClure

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fun headphones, but be warned they need a lot of power to take advantage of the drivers.
customer_reviews.author: yes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Fits my needs perfect. Great sound quality and good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Received was Defective
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak much to the headphone quality as the pair I received only played back through the Left Ear.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: on ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: nice sounds and quality but its not Over-Ear its on-ear headphones
customer_reviews.author: teemo_990

customer_reviews.title: Gather a fault after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headphones but gathered a fault. Real shame because I luved these headphones and really looked after them. Right ear had a vibration after a few months sounds like they have blown. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: My friend has owned a pair of these for over a year now and I have just recieved a pair myself. The sound quality is amazing, some of the best headphones I have tried. Very comfortable as well and I don't have the smallest ears..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sound amazing, but VERY uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are honestly one of the best I have heard in the price range, if not THE best. The saddest thing is that I can't leave them on for more than 20 minutes without my ears hurting from the immense lack of padding and tremendous clamp force. The build is great, but the pads are thin. The cup sizes are too small and are basically on-ear and not over-ear at all. I left it on a box to stretch out but the headphone strap is so good and flexible that it did nothing...so basically I could not use it on my moderately large head.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, comfort could be better
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have a great sound with a wide frequency range from bass to treble. The sound is so great it pains me to note that the padding on the arching headband just wasn't adequate for my head. If I had hair it might be not a problem but as I am bald the band weighs heavy on my scalp after a short while. The ear muffs are very comfortable and I wonder why they scrimped on the headband. So while this is one of the best headphones I have tried, the comfort issue is a bit of a deal breaker for me. Might not be such a big deal for women and men with hair.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the sound quality of these headphones. I am a music lover who is constantly listening to music. I also needed some headphones that I could wear at work to drown out the office noise. These are comfortable to wear and my music sounds great - I usually stream from my phone/computer or listen to music saved on my phone. These headphones have a nice, full range and I like the way the bass sounds with these. I am by no means an audiophile or expert, but I definitely think these are worth the price after trying out several different sets of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rae

customer_reviews.title: Not over ear.
customer_reviews.text: They sound fantastic, but get uncomfortable for me after about 30 minutes or so since they sit on ear, and my ears are not particularly large. I keep flip flopping between these and my Fidelio L2's, as these sound better to me overall, but the Fidelio's are MUCH more comfortable for short or long term listening. I read a forum post from a company representative where he said they are mainly marketed to Asian markets, which is why they called them 'over ear' headphones. I assume that means he's implying that the average ear size where they mainly sell these is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: wiski

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, if a bit snug
customer_reviews.text: Ever since my audiophile son started using these, I haven't seen him with them off. He's wanted over ear headphones since forever, so much so that he paid the tax on these himself (and that was a hefty price for a kid with no job). They are comfortable, if a bit snug. I think that will cure itself with time. The sound is excellent, if my few seconds on it are any indication (it was all he'd give me). The son says fantastic and five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good dynamic range and crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a set of headphones that I use with a keyboard synthesizer. Te sound is clear and crisp with very good dynamic range. These are slightly smaller then the pair of Sony headphones I was replacing which makes it easier to wear because of their lighter weight.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Geek

product_meta.title: 1MORE Triple Driver Over-Ear Headphones Comfortable Foldable Earphones with Hi-Res Hi-Fi Sound, Bass Driven, Tangle-Free Detachable Cable for Smartphones/Android/PC/Tablet - Silver/Titanium
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver| Style:Triple Driver Over-Ear

 Together with thin yet multi-layered ceramic tweeter, 1MORE Triple Driver over-ear headphones allow precise treble sound reproduction that is gentle and pleasantly natural via much faster response efficiency for every exquisite sound detail. The dynamic driver with aerospace-grade metal and polymer materials delivers truly natural midrange of a balanced sound stage. 

 The sound is deep and rich with a bass reflector. Discover the subtle sound details you may haven’t noticed as before. 

 Highlights 

 * Audio-grade and hyper-realistic with no distortion 

 * HF range extends to 40 kHz 

 * Oxygen-free copper wire delivers a meticulous Hi-Fi sound 

 * Hi-Res attested for high resolution 

 * Great for all kinds of music genre 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
feature_bullets: STUNNING STUDIO QUALITY SOUND WITH THREE DRIVERS - 40 mm graphene dynamic driver + ceramic tweeter + bass reflector deliver a hyper-realistic detailed sound stage with silky highs, precise mids, and deep bass
STATE-OF-THE-ART DURABLE ALUMINUM ALLOY DESIGN - Anodized aluminum alloy ear cups for lasting durability and fingerprint resistance
LUXURIOUS COMFORT - Adjustable stainless steel leather cushioned headband with rotating leather cushioned ear cups ensure a comfortable fit that perfectly conforms to your head and ears

PERFECT FOR TRAVEL - Closed back noise isolating ear cups naturally quiet your surroundings while keeping sound from escaping. Collapsible design conveniently fits into included deluxe compact travelling case
TUNED TO PERFECTION - Expertly tuned by Grammy winning sound engineer Luca Bignardi for a fully balanced and precise soundstage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars156 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
